channel.title: Books on Shelter's House
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Shelter's House

item.title: Monthly Reads
item.description: In December I finished 11 books. That’s CRAZY! I think that I associate the holiday season with curling up with a book.. and therefore take every opportunity to do so! The books: The Graveyard Book Vol 1, The Graveyard Book Vol 2, Winter Stroll, Winter Storms, Eligible, Crooked Kingdom, The Woman in Cabin 10, All The Time in the World, A Man Called Ove, Paper Princess Thoughts: The Graveyard Book by Neil Gaiman, and Craig P.
